content: pandamonium is a hat knit in the round from the bottom up the hat starts with a 2x2 rib and then continues with an adorable panda colorwork pattern this whimsical hat continues with an ombre effect as the color changes from one shade to another designed with a dk/light worsted weight yarn to be a quick and easy knit > buy 3 get one free place 4 of my patterns in your cart and the 4th least expensive will be free no coupon code needed happy knitting share your pandamonium hat on social media with #pandamoniumhat finished dimensions 18 inches 46 cm in diameter unstretched 9½ inches 24 cm from edge turned up to crown yarn cascade 220 superwash light worsted/dk per the manufacturer 100% superwash wool 100 g/3 5 oz 220 yards/200 meters * color a - gray 816 1 skein * color b - white 871 1 skein * color c black 815 1 skein * color d caribbean 847 1 skein note i used approximately ¾ skein of color a 1/3 skein of color b ¼ skein of color c and ½ skein of color d in the sample shown your results may differ based on yarn weight gauge or needle size notions stitch marker tapestry needle pom pom maker optional
